sentence.Network_en: In his diary of 1944 he proclaims unswerving loyalty to the monarchy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在1944年的日记里声称对君主忠贞不贰。

sentence.Network_en: He was an unswerving empiri-cist with little time for theory.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个坚定不移的经验论者，不屑研究理论。

sentence.Network_en: He showed unswerving loyalty to his friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 他表现了对朋友始终不渝的忠心.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... unswear 违背 unswerving 不歪的 unsyllabic 不构成音节的.
大学体验英语(二) ... 1 regeneration n. 新生，再生，复苏 2 unswerving adj 坚定的；不懈的 3 totem n. 图腾；图腾形象.
SAT-填空题OG - 豆丁网 ... unwitting 不知情的，无意的 unswerving 不偏离的, 坚定的, 始终不渝的 inhibiting 抑制作用的, 约束的.
坚定 in English, translation,... ... 坚持下去 to press on 坚定不移 unflinching;unswerving 坚定性 steadfastness;firmness.

list.abs: Our continued success depends upon unswerving adherence to this standard ., 持续的成功有赖于坚定地遵守这一原则.
adhere unswerving to the guidance status of marxism ., 始终不渝地坚持马克思主义的指导地位.
Excellent products and high quality services is our unswerving pursuit ., 优良的产品与优质的服务是我们坚持不懈的追求.
I suppoes gymnasts require iron will and unswerving spirit ., 我想 , 体操运动员要求有钢铁般的意南和百折不挠的精神.

entry.tran: 坚定不移的；立场坚定的；毫不动摇的
entry.def: If you describe someone's attitude, feeling, or way of behaving as unswerving, you mean that it is strong and firm and does not weaken or change.

example.ex: In his diary of 1944 he proclaims unswerving loyalty to the monarchy.
example.tran: 他在1944年的日记里声称对君主忠贞不贰。

example.ex: ...her unswerving belief in her father's innocence.

means.word_mean: 1. going directly ahead from one point to another without veering or turning aside;

sentences.sentence: "some people see evolution as an undeviating upward march from simple organisms to the very complex"
"a straight and narrow tree-lined road unswerving across the lowlands"

means.word_mean: 2. firm and dependable especially in loyalty;

auth_sentence.content: What floored Feldman was the unswerving unconventionality of Cage's mind.
auth_sentence.res_content: What floored Feldman was the unswerving unconventionality of Cage's mind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What floored Feldman was the unswerving unconventionality of Cage's mind.

auth_sentence.content: Isherwood's commitment to Vedanta, like Salinger's, was unswerving and lifelong.
auth_sentence.res_content: Isherwood's commitment to Vedanta, like Salinger's, was unswerving and lifelong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Isherwood's commitment to Vedanta, like Salinger's, was unswerving and lifelong.

auth_sentence.content: His approach demands unswerving faith, regardless of the setbacks that they may encounter.
auth_sentence.res_content: His approach demands unswerving faith, regardless of the setbacks that they may encounter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His approach demands unswerving faith, regardless of the setbacks that they may encounter.

means.word_mean: 坚持不懈的,坚定不移的

sentences.en: He had an unswerving devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 他坚定不移地忠于职守。

sentences.en: He showed unswerving loyalty to his friends.
sentences.cn: 他表现了对朋友始终不渝的忠心。

sentences.en: The general had an unswerving devotion to duty.
sentences.cn: 这位将军坚定不移地忠于职守。
